results.content: I took from this course that a program language such as SQL is not impossible to understand as I have zero technical background. The instructor does a great job of taking time to explain each topic covered.
results.content_html: I took from this course that a program language such as SQL is not impossible to understand as I have zero technical background. The instructor does a great job of taking time to explain each topic covered.

results.content: too many repeats the same and some logic was lost. Why did the alias go after we started to use it in some previous lecture?
results.content_html: too many repeats the same and some logic was lost. Why did the alias go after we started to use it in some previous lecture?

results.content: The course is aimed at people who have never seen SQL and also have no computer background. For me personally the delivery was too basic and slow with no exercises, which makes the course a good introduction but do not let you apply gained knowledge.  Giving it 4 start due to lack of exercises
